fields.name: name
fields.label: Section Name
fields.description: The label shown for this section in the Content Tree

fields.name: id
fields.label: Section ID
fields.description: Enter a unique ID (e.g., "specifications", "faq-section") if you want to create links that jump directly to this section.

fields.name: loadMoreTextContent
fields.label: Load More Text Content
fields.description: Text content for load more button

fields.name: noResultMessage
fields.label: No Result Message
fields.description: Text to display when no result search

fields.name: property
fields.label: Sort Property
fields.description: Property comes from product model attributes

fields.name: isDefaultSearch
fields.label: Is Default Search Option
fields.description: Whether this is the default search option

fields.name: collection-card_ctaPrimaryText
fields.label: Primary CTA Label
fields.value: Required if you has Primary CTA content

fields.name: mode_type
fields.label: Content Type is SVG Mode?
fields.description: Switch OFF: Text Mode | Switch ON: SVG Mode

fields.name: cta1_primaryText
fields.label: Primary CTA Label
fields.value: Required when Primary CTA content is provided

fields.name: cta2_secondaryText
fields.label: Secondary CTA Label
fields.value: Required when Secondary CTA content is provided
